metadata.synopsis: The player has pulled the body from the tunnel in the goblin prison, but it's still blocked by debris. The player can attack it if they can do enough damage (vulnrable to Force damge), are small enough to get good levrage, or shapeshifted into a badger. This AD plays to inform the player the way is still blocked and to hint at the solution.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load WLD_Main_AGo to 416; 37; -32 (Goblin Prison)Click on the body and free it from the tunnelClick on the tunnel again

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Still blocked - but should be easy enough to clear.
